resources.string: Displays the number of unread tweets, mentions and direct messages as they are updated.
Before we get started, let\'s get you logged in and synced with Mastodon.
Great! We are now talking to Mastodon to sync your account.
Hope you enjoy Focus for Mastodon!
You aren\'t connected to the internet

Authentication failed, Mastodon has started charging developers for using their service and the cost is unaffordable for small businesses, I bypassed this restriction through other technical means, logging out and back in will work, if you still can\'t log in then please wait for my update
You can only send Direct Messages to one user!
User already belongs to the list, would you like to remove it?

Pull open the
navigation drawer
with a left
side swipe!

Page between
timelines with
a swipe either
way from the middle
of the screen!

Long click the
app bar to
jump to the top
of the timeline.

Click here to find new themes.

NOTES:
- This will disable the use of the built-in emoji keyboard when replying to a tweet.
- Please do not report bugs unless you can confirm them WITHOUT a custom theme applied.
Changing this will clear the app\'s cache.
Regular \"Roboto\" on most devices. Focus for Mastodon\'s default font is \"Roboto Light\".

Includes:
 - Hiding Action Bar
 - Actionable Toast Bar
 - Transparent System Bars (Android 4.4 only)

 Enabling this setting will affect scrolling performance.
Display the user\'s Mastodon handle instead of their name on timelines.

To enable iOS emojis in this app, you must have our free \"Sliding Emoji Keyboard - iOS\" app installed from the play store.\n\n NOTE: Emojis will continue to work in this app even if the trial has expired! That package is used as a plugin as well as a stand alone keyboard.
Auto-refresh timelines over both mobile data and WiFi.
Automatically check and notify for new mentions and direct messages on your second account along with the first.
Higher max means a slower refresh.
This will start a listener to post notifications as you receive new interactions (mentions, dm\'s, likes, retweets, or new followers).
To read more about Focus for Mastodon Pull, click this preference.
Open profiles and posts in a \"windowed\" view above the timelines.
Open posts containing a web page in full screen mode.

Reverse the click actions on tweets.

 Default (when disabled):
 - Long click to open tweet
 - Short click to expand post
Add links and pictures pages to the left of the timeline.
This does not apply to the app cache.
Max number of posts to store in the database.
Max number of mentions to store in the database.
Max number of direct messages to store in the database.
This will override all previous backups.
Will clear the cache to apply any theme changes.
Follow Focus for Mastodon on Mastodon
Display the \"like\", \"retweet\", \"reply\", \"bookmark\", and \"share\" buttons below every tweet, on the timeline
Uses old \" RT @username: ...\" to quote instead of Focus for Mastodon\'s quote method.\n\nAccessed from the Action Bar or menu on any tweet.
Do not display any boosts while scrolling your main timelines.
Click hashtag to remove the mute.
Insert any hashtags contained in the tweet into the reply.
Includes trimming and removing duplicates in your database.
Tweet is greater than 140 characters.\n\nWould you like to post using TwitLonger?
Use TwitPic to attach images to posts instead of Mastodon\'s image upload service.
Used to sync your syncing your position between devices
Enable this if your timeline jumps down one spot after you refresh your feed.
This is the Klinker Apps \"Portal\" app to stay up to date with the latest news as well as find all the best themes for Focus for Mastodon and EvolveSMS in one place!
Select a shortening service, or press back to edit the tweet.
You will be able to select either TwitLonger or Pwiccer (a service that converts your long tweet to an image for posting).
Error loading profile. Check your network connection.
Couldn\'t load timeline! Try checking your data connection.
You changed your username before Focus for Mastodon could save your ID! You will have to log out and back in once to make the correct changes!

Lots has changed recently with Focus for Mastodon, and to make sure I can give you the best experience, we have to do some cleanup before heading into the app! \n\nThis could take some time depending on the number of posts you store!
Done setting up Focus for Mastodon 2.0, enjoy!
Muting too many expressions may affect startup and refresh times.
Automatically open the keyboard to reply in the tweet viewer.
Searches the user\'s timeline for pictures. Will take more time depending on how current their pictures are.
Show the current position on the home timeline instead of the number of new tweets.
Always show the 3-Dot \"Overflow Menu\" in the Action Bar. Used for phones with a physical menu button.

Mastodon\'s APIs do not support adding an image to a direct message. For this reason, Focus for Mastodon will upload the picture to TwitPic and share the link to that picture with the recipient.\n\n This picture will be available to view on your TwitPic profile.
Mastodon\'s APIs do not support adding more than one image to a tweet.\n\n Focus for Mastodon will upload the pictures using TwitPic instead.
Remove images and formatting from the web browser and just show the text on a web page.
Enable the plain text browser only when on a mobile data connection, not over WiFi.
Download images immediately as they are live streamed or retrieved from a background refresh of the timeline.
Default page to open to when viewing a tweet.
We can only queue posts with no pictures!
Allows you to mute all posts coming from a specific application.

Since Mastodon holds some of your login information in it\'s system, the next screen may not allow you to login with your new account info immediately. If it skips this login and goes directly to the authorization page, simply hit the \"Sign Out\" button in the top right corner of the website to allow the app to log you into your second account.
Show or hide the items in the apps main navigation drawer.
If you have multiple accounts, this will let you select which account to perform the like or retweet with.
The contents of this drawer is filled by Focus for Mastodon Pull (Streaming).
This section will be filled as you interact more on Mastodon.\n\n Mentions, new followers, and retweets/likes on your statuses will start to show up here.
Mastodon has unfortunately disabled this functionality for third party applications.
If you disable this notification, the Android system could shut down the stream at any time. Use extreme caution.

Your system is not allowing Focus for Mastodon to automatically start Chrome Custom Tabs. To use this feature, you will be required to set chrome as your default system browser, otherwise, Focus for Mastodon will continue to use it\'s original in app browser.\n\nPlease select \"Yes\" if Chrome will be your default browser or \"No\" if you will not use it as default.
If a tweet contains a web url, it will open directly to that url instead of the tweet itself.

Mastodon only allows GIFs to be posted that are less than 5MB. Focus for Mastodon will grab the highest quality GIF version from Giphy that fits within these constraints.\n\nThe results you see all have a version that fits within this limit, I have not displayed GIFs whose quality is downsampled to fit within the 5MB limit.
As per Material Design guide lines in dark mode colors should be desaturated
Not all mobile phone support this feature, please test by yourself
Custom themes, custom home pages, and more to create your own unique Mastodon app
Unlock the limit of 8 custom launch pages
By continuing, you agree to follow by the following rules set and enforced by the %s moderators.
This server does not accept new registrations.
We\'ll pick a server based on your language if you continue without making a selection.
Log in with the server where you created your account.

Although the Mastodon app does not collect any data, the server you sign up through may have a different policy.\n\nIf you disagree with the policy for %s, you can go back and pick a different server.
TL;DR: We don\'t collect or process anything.
Include capital letters, special characters, and numbers to increase your password strength.
Why do you want to join?
This will help us review your application.
%1$s doesn\'t allow signups from %2$s. Try a different one or pick a different server.
Tap the link we sent you to verify %s. We\'ll wait right here.
Unlisted: Do not show in public timelines
Direct: Post to mentioned users only
%s doesn\'t appear to be a Mastodon server.
Are you sure you want to delete this post?
It is not something you want to see
Malicious links, fake engagement, or repetitive replies
You are aware that it breaks specific rules
The issue does not fit into other categories
Are there any posts that back up this report?
Is there anything else we should know?
Thanks for reporting, we\'ll look into this.
While we review this, you can take action against %s.
You won\'t see their posts or boosts in your home feed. They won\'t know they\'ve been muted.
They will no longer be able to follow or see your posts, but they can see if they\'ve been blocked.
When you see something you don\'t like on Mastodon, you can remove the person from your experience.
Mastodon is made of users on different servers.
Pick a server based on your interests, region, or a general purpose one. You can still connect with everyone, regardless of server.
Type or paste what\'s on your mind
Alt text describes your photos for people with low or no vision. Try to only include enough detail to understand the context.
e.g. A dog looking around suspiciously with narrowed eyes at the camera.

plurals.name: cant_add_more_than_x_attachments
plurals.item: You can\'t add more than %d media attachment
You can\'t add more than %d media attachments

resources.string: File %s is of an unsupported type
File %1$s exceeds the size limit of %2$s MB
Are you sure you want to sign out?
The author marked this media as sensitive. Tap to reveal.
The app needs access to your storage to save this file.
There\'s no app to handle this action
These are the posts gaining traction in your corner of Mastodon.
These are the hashtags gaining traction in your corner of Mastodon.
These are the news stories being shared the most in your corner of Mastodon.
These are the most recent posts by the people who use the same Mastodon server as you.
Your device lost connection to the internet
Mastodon for Android %s is ready to download.
Mastodon for Android %s is downloaded and ready to install.
You can always complete this later in the Profile tab.
You can add up to four profile fields for anything you want. Location, links, pronouns — the sky is the limit.
Mastodon is a decentralized social network, meaning no single company controls it. It’s made up of many independently-run servers, all connected together.
Every Mastodon account is hosted on a server — each with its own values, rules, & admins. No matter which one you pick, you can follow and interact with people on any server.
A network error occurred! Please check your connection and try again!
When the keyword or phrase is alphanumeric only, it will only be applied if it matches the whole word
